messages.message: hey everyone! good luck to us all. i'll start things off over here on the 6-8-11.
pointing my road north, seems like a good direction to head.
hey alice, good luck! that 6-8-11 is a monster spot, nice choice. i think i'll grab this spot over by the 6-5-3 and see if i can get some early roads going.
pointing my road toward the coast, hoping to find some wheat soon. good luck charlie, your turn!
hey everyone! good luck. those are some solid spots you guys picked out. i think i'll try my luck down here by the wheat fields and see if i can get a good harvest going.
pointing my road toward the coast, looking to bridge these fields together.
